title: Carpentries-Israel
text:
Carpentries-Israel is an unofficial interest group for students and researchers in Israel who are interested in attending Carpentries workshops, learning how to become a Carpentries instructor, or writing or contributing to Carpentries lesson materials!
Workshop events weâ€™ve held so far:

Data Carpentry Genomics, 29-31 October 2024

How to connect and join:

Join the carpentries-israel.slack.com #Slack workspace using this link
Fill out our expression of interest form to be contacted about future workshops
